name: Opennote
long_description:
Opennote is the one space for everything you study, turning chaos into clarity.

Most students struggle with scattered knowledge across different apps and tools that don't understand their learning style. Opennote changes that with a note-taking platform where AI knows your style, connects to your existing knowledge bases and the web, and provides proactive feedback and edits—right where you're already working.
one_liner: Write, learn, and connect ideas—all in one place
